1.text: Place your eggs in a single layer in a saucepan.

2.text: Cover the eggs with 2 inches (5.08 centimeters) of cold water.
2.vid: /e/ee/Boil an Egg So That It Peels Easily Step 2 Version 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Bring the water to a boil over high heat.
3.vid: /e/ee/Boil an Egg So That It Peels Easily Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Turn the stove off, cover the saucepan with a lid, and wait 11 to 13 minutes.
4.vid: /5/55/Boil an Egg So That It Peels Easily Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

5.vid: /c/c4/Make Hard Boiled Eggs in the Oven Step 4 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.text: Carefully transfer the eggs to the ice bath and wait 5 to 15 minutes.
6.vid: /9/94/Boil an Egg So That It Peels Easily Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Pull the eggs out of the water and set them down someplace where they won't roll away.
7.vid: /e/ed/Boil an Egg So That It Peels Easily Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Crack the shell first, but don't peel it.

9.text: Carefully peel the shell away from the egg.
9.vid: /d/dc/Boil an Egg So That It Peels Easily Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Dry the eggs off with a paper towel.

11.vid: /8/8e/Boil an Egg So That It Peels Easily Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

12.text: Fill a medium-sized saucepan halfway with water and bring it to a boil over high heat.

13.text: Gently place the eggs into the water.

14.text: Reduce the heat to a simmer and cook for 11 to 13 minutes.
14.vid: /e/ee/Boil an Egg So That It Peels Easily Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

15.text: Prepare an ice bath while the eggs are cooking.

16.text: Place the cooked eggs into the ice bath, and wait 5 to 15 minutes.
16.vid: /9/94/Boil an Egg So That It Peels Easily Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

17.text: Take the eggs out of the ice bath and set them down someplace where they won't roll away.
17.vid: /e/ed/Boil an Egg So That It Peels Easily Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

18.text: Crack the egg, then roll it across a hard surface.

19.text: Peel the shell away from the egg.
19.vid: /d/dc/Boil an Egg So That It Peels Easily Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

20.text: Dry the eggs off with a paper towel.

21.vid: /8/8e/Boil an Egg So That It Peels Easily Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4
